author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
Imagine that every person now is completely trackable because each person emits a radio signal. And no! this has nothing to do with conspiracy theories on nanites from vaccines. This one is real and I will actually show you the real radio signals.

And unlike other threats, this one is different because we can also use this against our threats. You see, everyone as a signal, whether they are good guys or bad guys. And surprisingly, those of use with privacy phones (de-Googled), have NO SIGNAL. Yay!

But we can track everyone with a Signal. And the biggest signal emitters, Apple iPhones, Apple Airtags, Apple Watch.

There is a danger to anyone who emits the signals since someone can track you even when they can't see you (like when you're at home). And the counter-surveillance is that you can also track those who are tracking you. No Airtag will be safe on your person. You can find it.

----------------------------------
BraX3 Privacy Phone is on https://braxtech.net
------------------
title: Counter-Surveillance Using Bluetooth!
